channel.title: Noob question, Launch control step seq with LED feedback
channel.description:
Hello there, I'm relative new in this axoloti patch making world. I have a novation launch control (The small one with 8 buttons and 16 knobs). I'd like to make a step sequencer with LED feedback, but i have a difficult time wrapping my head around how to make it. the buttons LED can respond to midi note or cc, and different velocity levels make them change colour. i like to have a cursor in one colour, showing me where I'm at in the bar, and another colour for steps im plotting in. plus the ability to change the step's value with the knobs.
Can someone help me in the right direction here, and tell me what and how I need to do? Simon

item.title: Noob question, Launch control step seq with LED feedback
item.dc:creator: @philoop
item.description:
@philoop wrote:

I made one up, but you have to change the launchcontrol buttons from note to ctlr 9-16
Patches/phi/Launchcontrol 8step sequencera.axp

Read full topic
item.source: Noob question, Launch control step seq with LED feedback

item.title: Noob question, Launch control step seq with LED feedback
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

You can try these objects, available in the community library.

Rbrt Contributions

step seq BLOCKS here are some modules for building step-seq's. my main focus was to simplify visual feedback for controllers that feature bi-directional MIDI, like the LIVID BASE or the NOVATION LAUNCHPAD.the help-patch should work with the factory-mapping of the BASE. I had a hard time recently to acieve this with 'regular patching',so I did an object for this,'seq midi feedback' would be good to know if it works with the launchpad... [image] besides,there are some other custom objects tâ€¦

Read full topic

@simuschi wrote:

Hello there,
I'm relative new in this axoloti patch making world.
I have a novation launch control (The small one with 8 buttons and 16 knobs). I'd like to make a step sequencer with LED feedback, but i have a difficult time wrapping my head around how to make it.
the buttons LED can respond to midi note or cc, and different velocity levels make them change colour.
i like to have a cursor in one colour, showing me where I'm at in the bar, and another colour for steps im plotting in. plus the ability to change the step's value with the knobs.

Can someone help me in the right direction here, and tell me what and how I need to do?
